1. this time; now 今度だけは遅刻を大目に見てやろう。I will overlook your lateness this time.
2. next time; another time; shortly; soon 今度ロンドンにいらっしゃったときには私たちのところにお立ち寄り下さい。Please drop in to see us next time you come to London.
3. recently; lately; the other day

meanings.meaning: 1. once; one time; on one occasion 習慣は一度身についてしまうと、断ち切るのがとても難しい。A habit is very difficult to shake off once it is formed.
